column5: Hey Guys,  Anyone here ever buy fishing related books from AMAZON.CA? If you check it out - they're selling books on SMALLMOUTH BASS for literally a penny! Check it out!  CLICK HERE  to check out the link.  I just bought 1 of the 2 "1 penny" value books... so, there's only one left. HURRY!!!  PS: Shipping costs about $6 +change.
